name: Elements RPG
description:
You've brought the world to the brink of annihilation.
Can you fight the coming disaster you've unleashed, or will your efforts be for nothing?







Made during the Extra Credits Game Jam in 48 hours.
Creators:
https://laetans.itch.io/ - pixel artist and concept art
Dice5 - Concept artist
bowmanruto - Concept artist
Cosmic Architect - Game Designer
